clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Ornithine Aspartic Acid Granules in NAFLD Against Silymarin Capsules
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Ornithine Aspartic Acid Granules in Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease Against Silymarin Capsules: a Randomized, Double-Blind, Multicenter Clinical Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, and positive control clinic trial which explores the efficacy and safety of ornithine aspartate granules in the treatment of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease against silymarin capsules. The hypothesis is that the ornithine aspartate granules have similar or better efficacy than the silymarin capsules.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at 4 weeks, 12 weeks, and 24 weeks
